channel.title: Question on joining a server wid [HAM]
channel.description:
Hey, my friend is making a server using HAM... I think I heard somewhere that you should have a router to use a HAM server. I don't have one tho... Does that mean I won't be able to use his server? If I can use HAM is there a risk in downloading it? Using it?
Please hurry on your anwser! :(
[center] ~ THANKS, Da cheat1[/center]
